about_the_game:
AYON: Split in Time


Embark on an epic time-travel adventure in AYON: Split in Time. As Dahx, you’ll traverse multiple eras to reunite with your lost brother, Aidan. Armed with ancient artifacts called Ayons, you’ll navigate a world brimming with mystery, danger, and discovery.

A Vast, Exciting World 🌍

Explore richly detailed environments spanning tropical islands 🏝️, dense forests 🌲, snowy mountains 🏔️, and arid deserts 🏜️. Each era presents unique challenges and hidden secrets. Navigate intricate dungeons and vast landscapes, facing diverse enemies and formidable bosses. Seamless transitions between time periods add depth to your exploration, making each discovery more rewarding.

Master Time Manipulation ⏳

Harness the Ayons’ power to bend time and solve complex puzzles 🧩. Each Ayon possesses unique abilities to help you overcome obstacles and progress. Master these mechanics to gain an edge in combat and uncover your family’s legacy.

Forge Your Own Path 🛡️

Customize Dahx’s abilities to match your playstyle. Enhance combat skills, develop powerful magic, and upgrade equipment to face mounting challenges. Your choices shape Dahx’s journey, ensuring a personalized adventure.

An Epic, Time-Spanning Drama 🎭

Immerse yourself in a compelling narrative across multiple timelines. Unravel the mystery of your parents’ disappearance and the ancient artifacts they discovered. Experience a tale of brotherhood, betrayal, and redemption, woven through a rich tapestry of historical and fantastical elements.

Dynamic Combat and Exploration ⚔️

Engage in fast-paced combat with varied weapons and abilities. Use the environment to your advantage and adapt to each era’s unique conditions. From fierce creature battles to intricate puzzles, the gameplay keeps you constantly engaged.

Immersive Audiovisual Experience 🎶

Lose yourself in a captivating soundscape that adapts to your environment and actions, crafted by a visionary composer. Coupled with stunning visuals and meticulously detailed environments, AYON: Split in Time creates a truly immersive world.

Engaging 2D Pixel Art Minigames 🎮

Take a break from the main adventure with fun and nostalgic 2D pixel art minigames. Hunt for ancient gems in hidden caves and enjoy a variety of mini-challenges that add extra layers of excitement to your journey.

Join Dahx on his quest to reunite with Aidan, uncover time travel’s secrets, and save their world from impending doom. AYON: Split in Time offers a unique blend of adventure, puzzle-solving, and action that will captivate players and leave them craving more.
